Get Started

Take a moment to pause

Connecting with your experience without expectation or agenda.

Get Started
"I found the session so helpful and impactful on my life today. Before the sessions I found it quite difficult to stay calm in stressful situation. Mindefullness has help me to use my breath to recognise thing around me to feel at peace. The sessions allowed me to recgnise we're not alone with our busy mind via sharing my experience with others. "

— Grace

Why?

Mindfulness is the basic human ability to be fully present, aware of where we are and what we’re doing, and not overly reactive or overwhelmed by what’s going on around us. While mindfulness is something we all naturally possess, it’s more readily available to us when we practice on a daily basis. Whenever you bring awareness to what you’re directly experiencing via your senses, or to your state of mind via your thoughts and emotions, you’re being mindful.

How?

Mindfulness is available to us in every moment, whether through meditations and body scans, or mindful moment practices like taking time to pause and breathe when the phone rings instead of rushing to answer it. Our sessions can help you achieve this in a calm and relax space. Sometimes mindfulness makes you turn towards things you would normally avoid. That can be challenging. As an experienced mindfulness teacher I can help you to pace yourself.

What?

Our lunchtime sessions on a Monday give a welcome back from the busy life at work Join us on a Monday lunch 12.30 at XXXX We also have Monday Evening sessions 7.30 at XXXX Classes are £8 a session. You don't need to bring anything.

More about mindfulness

Life is busy, take time for you.

Mindfulness enhances your life in many ways - reducing stress, improving mental health, boosting focus, enhancing relationships, and fostering contentment, all by being present in the moment. It's a versatile solution for emotional balance, stress relief, and personal growth
